segments.text: 6 500 yuan . You will get it on the price tag .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It s a little overpriced . Is there any discount on this laptop ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Its already very cheap . Let's make it 6 000 yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ d buy this if it were cheaper . How about 5 000 yuan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hum ... I say 5 500 yuan . That's as cheap as it can get .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , this is our rock bottom price .

segments.text: Alright , I ’ ll buy this one .
